Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-4032 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-4032 affecting package python3 for versions less than 3.9.19-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python3 is earlier than 3.9.19-6, affected by CVE-2024-4032
